bridge-type.label: KNX/IP Gateway
bridge-type.description: This is a KNX IP interface or router

parameter.name: type
parameter.label: IP Connection Type
parameter.description: The ip connection type for connecting to the KNX bus. Could be either TUNNEL or ROUTER

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the KNX/IP gateway

parameter.name: portNumber
parameter.description: Port number of the KNX/IP gateway
parameter.label: Port

parameter.name: localIp
parameter.label: Local Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the local host to be used to set up the connection to the KNX/IP gateway

parameter.name: localSourceAddr
parameter.label: Local Device Address
parameter.description: The Physical Address (Individual Address) in x.y.z notation for identification of this KNX/IP gateway within the KNX bus

parameter.name: useNAT
parameter.label: Use NAT
parameter.description: Set to "true" when having network address translation between this server and the gateway

parameter.name: readingPause
parameter.label: Reading Pause
parameter.description: Time in milliseconds of how long should be paused between two read requests to the bus during initialization

parameter.name: responseTimeout
parameter.label: Response Timeout
parameter.description: Seconds to wait for a response from the KNX bus

parameter.name: readRetriesLimit
parameter.label: Read Retries Limit
parameter.description: Limits the read retries while initialization from the KNX bus

parameter.name: autoReconnectPeriod
parameter.label: Auto Reconnect Period
parameter.description: Seconds between connection retries when KNX link has been lost, 0 means never retry, minimum 30s
